en: Will you show me your album?
zh: 能给我看下你的相册吗？

en: Your advice counted for much.
zh: 你的建议对我来说很重要。

en: I cannot do without your advice.
zh: 我没你的建议可不行。

en: Without your advice, I would have failed in the attempt.
zh: 要不是你给我建议，我肯定搞砸了。

en: Will you lend me your CD player for an hour?
zh: 你能把你的CD机借我用一个小时吗？

en: Let me give you an example.
zh: 我给你举个例子吧。

en: You can hardly expect me to help you.
zh: 你别指望我会帮你。

en: May I count on you to get me the job?
zh: 我能指望你帮我搞定这份工作吗？

en: May I request a favour of you?
zh: 能请你帮个忙吗？

en: Mail for you will be held until you call for it.
zh: 你的信件会一直存着，等你来取。

en: Read such a book as will be useful to you.
zh: 读点儿对你有用的书。

en: There's a lady asking for you.
zh: 有位女士找你。

en: The time has come when I must tell you the truth.
zh: 是时候告诉你真相了。

en: Let me introduce my mother to you.
zh: 我来给你介绍一下我妈。

en: I'm about to tell you the answer.
zh: 我正要告诉你答案。

en: I'd like you to be my partner.
zh: 我想让你当我的搭档。

en: Do I pay you or the cashier?
zh: 是把钱给你还是给收银员？

en: Little did I dream of doing you any harm.
zh: 我压根儿没想过要害你。

en: Many people would agree with you.
zh: 很多人都会同意你的。

en: You're wanted on the phone. It's from Tom.
zh: 有你电话，是汤姆打来的。

en: I would like you to assist me with my gardening.
zh: 我想让你帮我打理一下花园。

en: Let me show you many things which will be novel to you.
zh: 我带你看点儿你没见过的新鲜玩意儿。

en: I wish I had asked you for advice.
zh: 我要是早点儿听你的建议就好了。

en: I'll do your shopping, clean up the house, and cook your dinner for you.
zh: 我帮你去买东西、打扫房间，然后再给你做晚饭。

en: I have something to talk over with you.
zh: 我有点儿事想跟你商量。

en: I didn't get your last name.
zh: 我没听清你姓什么。

en: There's a man at the door who wants to see you at all costs.
zh: 门口有个男的，非要见你不可。

en: I'll make you a present of a doll.
zh: 我想送你一个洋娃娃。

en: I will buy you a new word processor.
zh: 我给你买台新的文字处理器。

en: Don't bite the hand that feeds you.
zh: 别过河拆桥。

en: The president of the company, to whom I introduced you, wants to see you again.
zh: 我介绍给你认识的那位老总想再见见你。

en: I wanted you to help me with my homework.
zh: 我本来想让你帮我写作业的。

en: I meant to have written to you.
zh: 我本打算给你写信的。

en: I must beg your pardon.
zh: 我得跟你道个歉。

en: Might I ask you a question?
zh: 能问你个问题吗？

en: May I ask you a question?
zh: 我可以问你个问题吗？

en: I'll tell you about my father.
zh: 我给你讲讲我爸的事。

en: I will tell you the history of my life.
zh: 我给你讲讲我的经历。

en: I will show you my new car.
zh: 给你看看我的新车。

en: I am sending you a picture of my family.
zh: 我发张全家福给你。

en: I want you to stay with me.
zh: 我想让你留下来陪我。

en: I would like you to go home with me.
zh: 我想请你跟我一起回家。

en: We would like you to join our company.
zh: 我们很希望你来我们公司。

en: We do not insist that you do things our way.
zh: 我们不强求你非得按我们的套路来。

en: I am pleased to see you again.
zh: 很高兴又见到你了。

en: I submit this plan for your consideration.
zh: 这个计划你考虑一下。

en: I will show you how to go to the park.
zh: 我教你怎么去公园。

en: I tell you this.
zh: 我跟你说。

en: I was scared that you might leave me.
zh: 我以前很怕你会离开我。

en: I have no intention of telling you the result.
zh: 我没打算告诉你结果。

en: There is an urgent message for you.
zh: 有你的紧急消息。

en: I don't have the authority to give you the green light.
zh: 我没权限给你开绿灯。

en: I have urgent business with you.
zh: 我找你有急事。

en: He won't do you any harm.
zh: 他不会伤害你的。

en: Here's to you!
zh: 敬你！

en: I'd like for you to go.
zh: 我想让你去。

en: I never see you without thinking of my father.
zh: 我每次见到你都会想起我父亲。

en: I am very glad to see you.
zh: 很高兴见到你。

en: It was very nice seeing you again.
zh: 很高兴再次见到你。

en: It's great to meet you.
zh: 认识你很高兴。

en: Every time I see you, I think of your father.
zh: 每次见到你，我都会想起你父亲。

en: Whenever I see you, I feel happy.
zh: 只要见到你，我就很开心。

en: I never see you without thinking of my mother.
zh: 我每次见到你都会想起我母亲。

en: A Mr Ono called to see you.
zh: 一位姓小野的先生来找过你。

en: There is a man at the door who wants to see you.
zh: 门口有个男人找你。

en: There's an American girl who wants to see you.
zh: 有个美国女孩想见你。

en: There is a gentleman to see you.
zh: 有位先生要见你。

en: A man who wanted to see you came while you were out.
zh: 你不在的时候，有个想见你的人来过。

en: There's somebody who wants to meet you.
zh: 有人想见你。

en: I'd rather you stayed at home.
zh: 我宁愿你待在家里。

en: I will show you some pictures.
zh: 我给你看几张照片。

en: Shall I give you something to read?
zh: 要我拿点读物给你看吗？

en: Let me get you something to drink.
zh: 我给你拿点喝的吧。

en: I keep nothing from you.
zh: 我对你毫无保留。

en: I'd like to give you a piece of advice.
zh: 我想给你个建议。

en: I have no secrets from you.
zh: 我对你没有秘密。

en: I fancy we've met before.
zh: 我觉得我们以前见过。

en: I have good news for you.
zh: 我有个好消息要告诉你。

en: What takes you only three days, takes me as many weeks.
zh: 你只要三天就能干完的事，我得花三个星期。

en: I hope you won't mind if I give you some advice.
zh: 希望你不介意我给你提点建议。

en: You have a large family to support; don't play for high stakes.
zh: 你要养活一大家子人呢，别赌那么大。

en: You heard from him?
zh: 你有他的消息了吗？

en: You can't imagine it, can you?
zh: 你想象不到吧？

en: You have two brothers.
zh: 你有两个兄弟。

en: You'll be told in advance.
zh: 会提前通知你的。

en: I have never clapped eyes on you before.
zh: 我以前压根儿没见过你。

en: You have the right to the truth.
zh: 你有权知道真相。

en: I cannot agree with you.
zh: 我不同意你的看法。

en: It may seem trivial to you, but for me it's worth paying attention to.
zh: 这对你来说可能是小事，但对我来说值得关注。

en: I would have you apply yourself to your studies.
zh: 我想让你把心思都花在学习上。

en: Do you have any brothers?
zh: 你有兄弟吗？

en: You may be able to read the handwriting on the wall, but it is Greek to me.
zh: 你可能看出了端倪，但对我来说就像看天书。

en: Maybe you don't know this, but nobody could ever take your place.
zh: 也许你不知道，但没人能取代你。

en: You have a sense of humor.
zh: 你挺幽默的。

en: I should have told you everything earlier.
zh: 我早该把一切都告诉你的。

en: Should I have asked you first?
zh: 我是不是该先问问你？

en: I have a great esteem for you.
zh: 我非常敬重你。

en: Do you have many hobbies?
zh: 你爱好很多吗？

en: You have no right to go there.
zh: 你没权利去那儿。

en: I am ready to do anything that I can for you, because I owe you a great deal.
zh: 我愿意为你做任何我能做的事，因为我欠你太多了。

en: I cannot lend this book to you.
zh: 这本书我没法借给你。

en: You'll be in charge of the girls working in this factory.
zh: 厂里这些女工以后就归你管了。

en: Remember I will always be at your back.
zh: 记住，我永远都会在背后支持你。

en: It looks very good on you.
zh: 这身衣服你穿挺好看的。

en: Choose friends you can rely on.
zh: 要交靠得住的朋友。

en: When will it be convenient for you?
zh: 你什么时候方便？

en: I will give you the money.
zh: 钱我会给你的。

en: I shall let you see that.
zh: 我会让你看的。

en: I had hoped to meet you there.
zh: 我本来希望能在那儿见到你的。

en: I'll leave everything to you.
zh: 所有的事儿就全交给你了。

en: This is all I can do for you.
zh: 这是我唯一能为你做的了。

en: I'd like you to read this book.
zh: 我想让你读读这本书。

en: I'd like you to translate this book into English.
zh: 我想让你把这本书翻译成英文。

en: I can't lend you this book.
zh: 我不能把这书借给你。

en: I am looking forward to seeing you in this town.
zh: 我期待着在这个镇上见到你。

en: You are the last person I would have expected to see here.
zh: 真没想到能在这儿碰到你。

en: I am glad to run into you here.
zh: 挺高兴能在这儿遇上你。

en: I have something good to tell you.
zh: 我有个好消息要告诉你。

en: There is a lady downstairs who wants to speak to you.
zh: 楼下有个女士想找你谈谈。

en: I would like to tell you something.
zh: 我想跟你说点事。

en: It was a pleasure meeting you, Mr Tamori.
zh: 田森先生，认识您很荣幸。

en: I'm happy to see you.
zh: 见到你真高兴。

en: I think he will be glad to see you.
zh: 我觉得他见到你应该会挺高兴的。

en: I would like you to make tea for me.
zh: 我想让你帮我泡杯茶。

en: Can I ask you a favor?
zh: 能帮我个忙吗？

en: It is a privilege to meet you.
zh: 能见到您是我的荣幸。

en: I am delighted to meet you.
zh: 很高兴认识你。

en: I'm very glad to meet you.
zh: 挺高兴认识你的。

en: It was nice to meet you, and I look forward to hearing from you.
zh: 认识你很高兴，期待你的消息。

en: I'm surprised to see you.
zh: 见到你我挺惊讶的。

en: There is a woman who wants to see you.
zh: 有个女人想见你。

en: We enjoyed having you as our guest.
zh: 招待你我们也挺开心的。

en: How much we pay you depends on your skill.
zh: 工资多少取决于你的能力。

en: I have something to give you.
zh: 我有东西要给你。

en: I want you to be an Einstein.
zh: 我希望你能成为爱因斯坦那样的人。

en: I would like you to meet my parents.
zh: 我想带你见见我父母。

en: We're confident that you are up to the challenge of the new position.
zh: 我们相信你一定能胜任这个新职位的挑战。

en: Since it is you, I have confidence you can solve it.
zh: 既然是你，我有信心你能解决它。

en: I just asked because I thought you would know.
zh: 我只是觉得你会知道才问的。

en: What do you figure on this?
zh: 关于这事儿你怎么想？

en: Who is it that you want to talk to?
zh: 你想找谁说话？

en: There's something I need to talk with you about.
zh: 我有点事儿想跟你谈谈。

en: I look forward to corresponding with you.
zh: 期待以后能多和你联系。

en: Is there any difference between your idea and hers?
zh: 你的想法和她的有什么不同吗？

en: I am no more an artist than you are.
zh: 我跟你一样，都不是什么艺术家。

en: You and he are both very kind.
zh: 你和他人都挺好的。

en: I quite agree with you.
zh: 我很赞成你的看法。

en: Let me exchange seats with you.
zh: 我跟你换个座儿吧。

en: I will discuss the question with you in detail.
zh: 我会跟你详细讨论这个问题的。

en: I would like to have a word with you.
zh: 我想跟你谈谈。

en: I make you a deal.
zh: 我跟你做个交易吧。

en: You and I must give him our present.
zh: 咱俩得把礼物送给他。

en: You and I are men.
zh: 咱俩都是男的。

en: You and I are old friends.
zh: 咱们是老朋友了。

en: You and I are good partners in business.
zh: 咱俩是生意上的好搭档。

en: You and I have succeeded in our attempt.
zh: 咱俩的尝试成功了。

en: You and I must understand one another, and that without delay.
zh: 咱俩得赶紧互相了解清楚。

en: Both you and I must take care of the dog.
zh: 咱俩都得照顾好这只狗。

en: Your problem and mine are similar.
zh: 咱俩的问题挺像的。

en: Between you and me, Lisa, we know that I simply don't like Nick.
zh: 丽莎，就咱俩知道，其实我根本不喜欢尼克。

en: There is no time like the time when you and I were young.
zh: 没什么比得上咱俩年轻那会儿了。

en: Do you remember the day when you and I first met?
zh: 你还记得咱俩第一次见面那天吗？

en: It was a great privilege working with you.
zh: 能跟你一起工作是我的荣幸。

en: Having worked with you was a real treat for me.
zh: 跟你共事真的太棒了。

en: I enjoyed your company.
zh: 跟你在一起很开心。

en: Who is taller, you or Ken?
zh: 你和肯谁更高？

en: It is no good arguing with you.
zh: 跟你争论根本没用。

en: Never have I dreamed of marrying you.
zh: 我压根儿没想过会和你结婚。

en: I might as well marry a bird as marry you.
zh: 我与其跟你结婚，还不如跟只鸟过呢。

en: I mistook you for your brother.
zh: 我把你当成你兄弟了。

en: It is useless even if I discuss with you.
zh: 就算跟你商量也没用。

en: I liked you even more when I met you.
zh: 见到你之后我更喜欢你了。

en: I'm very pleased to come with you.
zh: 很高兴能跟你一起来。

en: Had I better go with you?
zh: 我是不是最好跟你一块儿去？

en: It's a lot of fun to be with you.
zh: 跟你在一起特别有意思。

en: I really enjoyed your company.
zh: 我真的很喜欢跟你待在一起。

en: I'm the one who wants to be with you.
zh: 我才是那个想和你在一起的人。

en: I enjoyed your company very much.
zh: 我非常喜欢和你待在一起。

en: I want to make love with you.
zh: 我想和你做爱。

en: I identify with you.
zh: 我挺能理解你的。

en: It seems that I met you somewhere.
zh: 我好像在哪儿见过你。

en: I'm afraid I differ with you on this point.
zh: 这点我恐怕跟你的想法不一样。

en: I'd like to have a word with you.
zh: 我想跟你谈谈。

en: I have something to talk over with you, face to face.
zh: 我有事想跟你当面聊聊。

en: How long have you and Jane been married?
zh: 你和简结婚多久了？

en: I'm glad for this opportunity to work with you.
zh: 很高兴能有这个和你共事的机会。

en: Nice talking with you.
zh: 跟你聊得很开心。

en: I enjoyed talking with you.
zh: 我很喜欢和你聊天。

en: May I talk with you?
zh: 我能跟你聊聊吗？

en: May I have a talk with you?
zh: 我可以和你谈谈吗？

en: Being with you makes me feel happy.
zh: 跟你在一起我觉得很快乐。

en: I will come with you.
zh: 我跟你一起去。

en: You and your friends are invited.
zh: 你和你的朋友们都被邀请了。

en: You're a life saver.
zh: 你真是我的救星。

en: You're so set in your ways!
zh: 你这人太固执了！

en: You're such a pack rat.
zh: 你可真爱囤东西。

en: You're a wonderful guy.
zh: 你这人真不错。

en: How would you deal with the problem?
zh: 你打算怎么处理这个问题？

en: You young people have no sense of humor at all.
zh: 你们这些年轻人一点幽默感都没有。

en: I remember seeing you all somewhere.
zh: 我记得在哪儿见过你们。

en: You must not look down on old people.
zh: 别瞧不起老人。

en: Are you students?
zh: 你们是学生吗？

en: Do you walk hand in hand?
zh: 你们是牵着手走路吗？

en: You are all our guests tonight.
zh: 今晚你们都是我们的客人。

en: You can go there in a boat.
zh: 你可以坐船过去。

en: You are both in the wrong.
zh: 你们俩都错了。

en: Who is going to play the part in your play?
zh: 你们那个剧里，谁演那个角色？

en: May you have a very happy married life!
zh: 祝你们新婚快乐，生活幸福美满！

en: Have you met each other?
zh: 你们以前见过面吗？

en: Not only you but also he is in the wrong.
zh: 不光是你，他也错了。

en: I imagine you're not the only one, Mr Bark.
zh: 巴克先生，我想不光是你一个人。

en: You alone are my hope.
zh: 你是我唯一的希望。

en: You are my only resort.
zh: 我只能指望你了。

en: You're the only one who can help me.
zh: 只有你能帮我了。

en: It's OK with me if it's OK with you.
zh: 只要你没意见，我就没意见。

en: You are the very person I have been looking for.
zh: 你就是我一直要找的那个人。

en: People of your age often have this problem.
zh: 像你这个岁数的人经常有这毛病。

en: Who is the man that you were talking with?
zh: 刚才跟你说话的那个人是谁？

en: Are you aware of the fact that you are not spoken well of?
zh: 你知道大家都在背后议论你吗？

en: I've never seen you cook. Can you cook anything at all?
zh: 没见你下过厨，你到底会不会做饭啊？

en: You were seen to cook.
zh: 有人看见你做饭了。

en: If you are to be a good world citizen, you should try to be free of any prejudices.
zh: 要想做一个合格的世界公民，就应该努力撇开成见。

en: Please phone me when you have settled down.
zh: 等你安顿好了，记得给我打个电话。

en: She will come if you ask her.
zh: 只要你开口，她就会来的。

en: I'll lend you the book, provided you return it next week.
zh: 书可以借给你，但下礼拜得还我。

en: I will go if you come.
zh: 你应该来，我就去。

en: Tell me the time when you will come.
zh: 告诉我你什么时候过来。

en: I'll be so glad if you can come.
zh: 你要是能来，我真的太高兴了。

en: Let me know the days when you can come.
zh: 你哪天能来，跟我说一声。

en: I'm glad that you'll come.
zh: 听说你要来，我挺高兴的。

en: They were disappointed that you could not come.
zh: 听说你来不了，他们挺失望的。

en: It is a pity you cannot come.
zh: 真可惜你来不了。

en: I'm glad you could come. Please make yourself at home.
zh: 你能来太好了，别客气，就当在自己家一样。

en: I'm glad you could come.
zh: 你能来我真高兴。

en: I am looking forward to meeting you when you come.
zh: 很期待等你来的时候跟你见面。

en: If you care to come, you will be welcome.
zh: 你要是想来，我们随时欢迎。

en: What was it that you wanted?
zh: 你刚才想要什么？

en: I'll get you whatever you want.
zh: 只要你想要，我什么都给你弄来。

en: Take as many as you want.
zh: 想要多少随便拿。

en: Your encouragement will draw her out.
zh: 你的鼓励会让她开朗起来的。

en: I can't blame you for breaking your promise.
zh: 你没守信用，我也没法怪你。

en: Your father will lose face if you don't keep your promise.
zh: 你要是说话不算数，你爸会很没面子的。

en: May you return home safe!
zh: 祝你一路平安到家！

en: What is it that you really want to say?
zh: 你到底想说什么？

en: While you are reading to me, I can do my sewing.
zh: 你念给我听的时候，我可以顺便做点针线活。

en: I know that you are busy.
zh: 我知道你挺忙的。

en: I know how busy you must be, but I need your answer to my last email before I can proceed with the project. Can you take a moment and write me back?
zh: 我知道你肯定特别忙，但得收到你对上一封邮件的回信我才能推进项目，能抽空回我一下吗？

en: You came out of the room.
zh: 你从房间里出来了。

en: What was the music you were listening to?
zh: 你刚才听的是什么音乐？

en: Who will look after your cat while you are away?
zh: 你不在的时候，谁帮你照看猫啊？

en: If I had known about your illness, I would have visited you in the hospital.
zh: 要是我早知道你生病了，我肯定去医院看你了。

en: It is surprising that you should know her name.
zh: 没想到你竟然知道她的名字。

en: It was sensible of you to follow her advice.
zh: 你听她的建议是对的。

en: I can't imagine your not knowing her address.
zh: 我真没法想象你居然不知道她的地址。

en: It is strange that you should know nothing about her wedding.
zh: 真奇怪，你竟然对她的婚礼一无所知。

en: You might well ask her why she dislikes you.
zh: 你完全可以问问她为什么讨厌你。

en: You will do well to leave her.
zh: 你离开她会比较好。

en: I wouldn't object if you wanted to go with her.
zh: 如果你想跟她一起去，我没意见。

en: I am surprised that you should not know of their marriage.
zh: 没想到你竟然不知道他们结婚了。

en: You can be sure that the money you give them will be put to good use.
zh: 你放心，你给他们的钱肯定会用在刀刃上的。

en: He will be sleeping when you get to his house.
zh: 你到他家的时候，他肯定在睡觉。

en: You can tell him for all I care.
zh: 你爱怎么告诉他就怎么告诉他，我才不在乎。

en: It's no use your begging him for help.
zh: 你求他帮忙也没用。

en: Judging from what you have seen of him, this fellow is not a coward.
zh: 从你对他的了解来看，这家伙不是个胆小鬼。

en: I will never force you to marry him.
zh: 我绝对不会逼你嫁给他的。

en: For all you say about him, I still like him.
zh: 不管你怎么说他，我还是挺喜欢他的。

en: He will go swimming, whether you go with him or stay at home.
zh: 不管你跟不跟他去，还是待在家里，他都会去游泳。

en: Will you show me what you bought?
zh: 给我看看你买什么了？

en: The camera that you bought is better than mine.
zh: 你买的那个相机比我的好。

en: It's your deal.
zh: 该你发牌了。

en: I'll look after the children while you go shopping.
zh: 你去逛街的时候，我来带孩子。

en: If you act like a fool, you must be treated as such.
zh: 你要是表现得像个傻瓜，别人就会把你当傻瓜待。

en: I will take care of you when you are old.
zh: 等你老了，我会照顾你的。

en: I will badly miss you if you leave Japan.
zh: 如果你离开日本，我会非常想你的。

en: I thought you were Japanese.
zh: 我还以为你是日本人呢。

en: While you are about it, please make a cup of coffee for me, too.
zh: 顺便也帮我冲杯咖啡吧。

en: We will miss you terribly if you leave Japan.
zh: 如果你离开日本，我们会非常舍不得你的。

en: Was he still here when you arrived?
zh: 你到的时候他还在吗？

en: Prior to your arrival, he left for London.
zh: 在你来之前，他就已经动身去伦敦了。

en: There is nothing for you to be angry about.
zh: 没什么好生气的。

en: It is natural that you should get angry.
zh: 你生气也是正常的。

en: I was disappointed that you didn't call.
zh: 你没给我打电话，我挺失望的。

en: I was taking a bath when you called me.
zh: 你给我打电话的时候我正在洗澡。

en: You don't have to be discouraged because you are not a genius.
zh: 就算不是天才也不用灰心。

en: Read whatever books you think proper.
zh: 只要是你觉得合适的书，就尽管读。

en: It is no use your resisting.
zh: 你反抗也没用。

en: I saw you making eyes at Mr Nagashima.
zh: 我看见你冲永岛先生抛媚眼了。

en: Give up smoking if you want to live long.
zh: 想长寿的话就戒烟吧。

en: Please visit as soon as you get into town.
zh: 你一进城就过来坐坐。

en: She was astonished that you spoke Chinese so well.
zh: 你的中文说得这么好，把她给惊着了。

en: I know that boy whom you don't know.
zh: 我认识那个你不认识的男孩子。

en: You must remember to tell him all that you know.
zh: 记着把你所知道的一切都告诉他。

en: Let's look at the path that you've walked so far.
zh: 咱们来看看你至今走过的路。

en: It's a better line than when you used to call me from the university.
zh: 这次通话质量比你以前在大学给我打的时候好多了。

en: When you dislike others, you are disliked by them in turn.
zh: 你讨厌别人的时候，别人反过来也会讨厌你。

en: We are hoping for your quick recovery.
zh: 祝你早日康复。

en: That you have come early is a good thing.
zh: 你能早点来是件好事。

en: If you concentrate all your energies on the study of English, you will master the language.
zh: 只要你全力以赴学英语，你一定能掌握这门语言。

en: It's all the same to me whether you will go to sea or not.
zh: 不管你去不去当海员，对我来说都一样。

en: I'll leave a key with my next-door neighbour in case you get here before I do.
zh: 我会把钥匙留给隔壁邻居，万一你比我先到。

en: I don't think there is any need for you to explain.
zh: 我觉得你没必要解释。

en: Listen to those whom you think to be honest.
zh: 听听那些你觉得诚实的人是怎么说的。

en: Granting that you are honest, that is no proof of your innocence.
zh: 就算你很诚实，那也不能证明你是清白的。

en: It has dawned upon my mind that you are in the right.
zh: 我突然意识到你是对的。

en: By the time you land at Narita, it will be dark.
zh: 等你在成田机场降落的时候，天已经黑了。

en: I am pleased at your success.
zh: 我为你取得的成功感到高兴。

en: Is there any place you recommend?
zh: 你有什么推荐的地方吗？

en: Whom do you respect most in your life?
zh: 你这辈子最敬佩的人是谁？

en: A woman visited us while you were sleeping.
zh: 你睡觉的时候，有个女的来找过我们。

en: Food you eat that you don't like will not be digested well.
zh: 吃自己不喜欢的东西是不好消化的。

en: He would have failed in his business but that you helped him.
zh: 要不是你帮他，他的生意早就失败了。

en: If it had not been for your help, I should have drowned.
zh: 要不是你帮我，我肯定淹死了。

en: Without your help, I would have been unable to do it.
zh: 没有你的帮助，我是搞不定的。

en: We will keep it for you until you leave.
zh: 我们会帮你收着，直到你离开。

en: I want to see you before you go.
zh: 我想在你走之前见见你。

en: Please be careful not to forget to lock the door when you go out.
zh: 出门的时候记得锁门，别忘了。

en: Your help will save us a lot of work.
zh: 有你帮忙，我们能省不少事。

en: If you will help me, we will soon finish.
zh: 如果你肯帮我，我们很快就能干完。

en: If you help me, I'll try it again.
zh: 要是你帮我，我就再试一次。

en: What's the name of the man whose car you borrowed?
zh: 你借车的那个人叫什么名字？

en: I think it is dangerous for you to drive a car.
zh: 我觉得你开车挺危险的。

en: It's your turn to answer the question.
zh: 轮到你回答问题了。

en: The reason for your failure is that you did not try hard enough.
zh: 你之所以失败是因为你不够努力。

en: I was afraid that you had failed.
zh: 我之前担心你失败了。

en: It is necessary for you to think about your life.
zh: 你很有必要思考一下自己的人生。

en: Do it yourself.
zh: 你自己动手吧。

en: She will be glad if you go to see her in person.
zh: 如果你亲自去看她，她会很高兴的。

en: If you can read the following, we can communicate in Japanese, too.
zh: 如果你能读懂下面这些，那我们也能用日语交流。

en: That you will pass the exam is certain.
zh: 你肯定能通过考试。

en: I am pleased that you have passed the exam.
zh: 很高兴你通过了考试。

en: I'm relying on you to help us.
zh: 我就指望你帮我们了。

en: Everyone will be happy if you help us.
zh: 要是你帮我们，大家都会很高兴的。

en: I am glad to help you whenever you need me.
zh: 只要你需要，我很乐意帮忙。

en: I will accept the work, provided that you help me.
zh: 只要你帮我，我就接这个活。

en: Do you want me to wait until you come for me?
zh: 你想让我一直等到你来接我吗？

en: You scratch my back and I'll scratch yours.
zh: 你帮我，我就帮你。

en: The problem has arisen simply because you didn't follow my instructions.
zh: 出现这个问题纯粹是因为你没按我说的做。

en: I am very grateful to you for what you've done for my family.
zh: 非常感谢你为我们家所做的一切。

en: I do not expect you to subscribe to my opinion.
zh: 我没指望你同意我的看法。

en: Pretend you're me.
zh: 假装你是我。

en: I'm glad you like my present.
zh: 很高兴你喜欢我送的礼物。

en: Either you or I should visit her.
zh: 要么是你，要么是我，咱俩得去一个人看看她。

en: Either you or I will have to go.
zh: 咱俩总得有一个人去。

en: Either you or I will get the first prize.
zh: 一等奖不是你的就是我的。

en: Either you or I will have to do it.
zh: 这事儿要么你做，要么我做。

en: Either you or I must attend the meeting.
zh: 咱俩必须得有一个人去开会。

en: I know nothing about him beyond what you told me.
zh: 除了你跟我说的，关于他我什么都不知道。

en: It is kind of you to talk about it for me.
zh: 谢谢你帮我说话。

en: The magazine which you lent me is very interesting.
zh: 你借我的那本杂志很有意思。

en: As you treat me, so will I treat you.
zh: 你怎么对我，我就怎么对你。

en: Tell me what you want me to do.
zh: 告诉我你想让我做什么。

en: I'll do whatever you want me to do.
zh: 你想让我做什么我就做什么。

en: It is kind of you to lend me the money.
zh: 谢谢你借钱给我，你人真好。

en: Either you or I am in the wrong.
zh: 不是你错了，就是我错了。

en: We have no objection to your joining us in our club.
zh: 我们不反对你加入我们的俱乐部。

en: Either you or I am right.
zh: 不是你对，就是我对。

en: I remember you often went to Betty's house to tea when you were a little girl.
zh: 我记得你小时候经常去贝蒂家喝茶。

en: When was it that you first met her?
zh: 你到底是什么时候第一次见到她的？

en: Dinner will be ready by the time you have finished your work.
zh: 等你忙完工作，晚饭就准备好了。

en: I'll recommend him as chairman, whether you are in favour of it or not.
zh: 不管你同不同意，我都会推荐他当主席。

en: Whether you agree or not, I cannot change my mind.
zh: 不管你同不同意，我都不会改变主意的。

en: I'll sweep the floor while you wash the dishes.
zh: 你洗碗，我扫地。

en: Will you show me what you bought yesterday?
zh: 能让我看看你昨天买了什么吗？

en: The man you saw in my office yesterday is from Belgium.
zh: 你昨天在我办公室看到的那个人是比利时来的。

en: The man that you saw there yesterday was Mr Brown.
zh: 你昨天在那儿看到的那个人是布朗先生。

en: Let me read the paper when you have finished with it.
zh: 你看完报纸之后借我看看。

en: Here's a comfortable chair you can sit in.
zh: 这儿有个挺舒服的椅子，你坐这儿吧。

en: If you are tied up now, I'll call you back later on.
zh: 你要是现在正忙，我晚点再给你打。

en: I want to know what you did this summer.
zh: 我想知道你这个暑假都干什么了。

en: It seems hard for you to see him today.
zh: 你今天想见到他恐怕有点难。

en: What you have just said reminds me of an old saying.
zh: 你刚才说的话让我想起了一句老话。

en: If you leave now, I'm sure you'll be caught in a traffic jam.
zh: 你要是现在走，肯定会遇上堵车。

en: What is it that you want me to do now?
zh: 你现在到底想让我做什么？

en: Who has made you what you are now?
zh: 是谁把你变成现在这个样子的？

en: I'll miss you when you're gone.
zh: 你走以后我会想你的。

en: It makes no difference to me whether you go or not.
zh: 你去不去对我来说都无所谓。

en: It's all the same to me whether you go or stay.
zh: 你是走是留对我来说都一样。

en: If you don't want to go, you don't need to.
zh: 你不想去的话就别去了。

en: We regret that you have to leave.
zh: 你要走我们觉得挺遗憾的。

en: If you don't go, I will not go either.
zh: 你不去，我也不去。

en: You may invite whoever you like.
zh: 你想请谁都行。

en: I do love you.
zh: 我是真的爱你。

en: She said 'I love you' to me.
zh: 她对我说了“我爱你”。

en: As you are sorry, I'll forgive you.
zh: 既然你道歉了，那我就原谅你。

en: He will come if you call him.
zh: 只要你叫他，他就会来。

en: I am feeling quite pleased about what you've said.
zh: 听了你刚才说的话，我挺开心的。

en: What you said was in the main right.
zh: 你说的基本上是对的。

en: You say "ditto", and that's not the same as "I love you".
zh: 你说“我也是”，这跟说“我爱你”可不是一回事。

en: I know you are clever.
zh: 我知道你很聪明。

en: I can't study with you watching me.
zh: 你这么盯着我，我没法学习。

en: It's quite natural that you should think about marriage.
zh: 你想结婚是很正常的事。

en: When you get married and have kids, you'll realize that actions speak louder than words.
zh: 等你以后结婚生了孩子，你就会明白说得好不如做得好。

en: It makes no difference to me whether you are rich or poor.
zh: 不管你有钱没钱，对我来说都一样。

en: I really look forward to your visit in the near future.
zh: 我很期待你近期能来。

en: If you don't do your duty, people will look down on you.
zh: 你要是不尽责，大家会瞧不起你的。

en: What you were taught is wrong.
zh: 你学到的那些东西都是错的。

en: I received great benefit from your teaching.
zh: 听了你的教导，我受益匪浅。

en: I understand you are going to spend your vacation in New Zealand.
zh: 我听说你打算去新西兰度假。

en: The artist whose paintings you liked is a friend of mine.
zh: 那个你很喜欢的画家是我的一个朋友。

en: There is one important fact of which you are unaware.
zh: 有个重要的事情你可能还没意识到。

en: What was your mother doing when you returned home?
zh: 你回家的时候，你妈在干嘛呢？

en: By the time you get home, all the cherry blossoms will have fallen.
zh: 等你到家的时候，樱花估计都落光了。

en: I'll be in bed by the time you get home.
zh: 等你到家的时候，我都已经睡了。

en: There are a few points where you are mistaken.
zh: 你有几个地方搞错了。

en: Tell me the reason why you were late for school.
zh: 说说吧，你上学迟到是因为啥？

en: This letter arrived while you were out.
zh: 你出门的时候，这封信寄到了。

en: We often hear you sing.
zh: 我们常听你唱歌。

en: Please look through these papers at your leisure.
zh: 你有空的时候把这些资料看一遍。

en: I found your coat after you left the house.
zh: 你走之后我找到了你的外套。

en: Whatever you say will set her off crying.
zh: 不管你说啥，她都会哭的。

en: No matter what you say, I am convinced that I am right.
zh: 不管你怎么说，我还是觉得我是对的。

en: I can't make out what you are trying to say.
zh: 我听不明白你想说什么。

en: Tell me what you mean.
zh: 说说你到底是什么意思。

en: I know what your game is.
zh: 我知道你在耍什么花招。

en: Tell me what you are looking forward to.
zh: 跟我说说你都在期待些什么。

en: No matter what you may say, I will not change my mind.
zh: 无论你怎么说，我也不会改变主意的。

en: I will lend you any book that I have, so long as you keep it clean.
zh: 只要你能保持干净，我的书随便你借。

en: With your help, our plan would succeed.
zh: 有你帮忙的话，我们的计划肯定能成功。

en: It will be hard for you to speak English.
zh: 对你来说，开口说英语挺难的。

en: English will take you a long time to master.
zh: 掌握英语得花你不少时间。

en: The thing that you are intending to carry does not need to be carried.
zh: 你想带的那东西其实没必要带。

en: Pick out the shirt that you like best.
zh: 挑一件你最喜欢的衬衫吧。

en: Who is your favourite TV star?
zh: 你最喜欢的电视明星是谁？

en: I cannot consent to your going alone.
zh: 我不同意你一个人去。

en: Let me put it in plain language you can understand.
zh: 我用你能听懂的简单话解释一下。

en: It is dangerous for you to travel to a foreign country by yourself.
zh: 你一个人去国外旅游挺危险的。

en: It will be late autumn when you get to London.
zh: 你到伦敦的时候应该是深秋了。

en: I want to split up, but I know I couldn't even if I tried.
zh: 我想分手，但我知道自己根本狠不下心。

en: I've been looking forward to hearing from you for weeks.
zh: 我都盼了你好几个星期的消息了。

en: I have got a letter from you.
zh: 我收到你的信了。

en: I found your letter in the mailbox.
zh: 我在信箱里看到你的信了。

en: I can't seem to find your last e-mail, I wonder if you can resend it to me.
zh: 我找不到你上一封邮件了，能不能麻烦你再发一遍？

en: I can't believe I misplaced the party information and registration you sent to me.
zh: 我竟然把你发给我的派对信息和报名表给弄丢了。

en: We are looking forward to hearing from you soon.
zh: 期待尽快收到你的回信。

en: I have been hoping to hear from you.
zh: 我一直盼着你的消息。

en: We look forward to receiving your prompt reply.
zh: 期待您的尽早回复。

en: I wonder if you received my e-mail on January 10, since I have not heard anything from you yet.
zh: 1月10号发的邮件你收到了吗？我还没收到你的回复。

en: I will come on Wednesday evening unless I hear from you to the contrary.
zh: 除非你另有通知，不然我周三晚上过去。

en: I would like to borrow fifty dollars from you.
zh: 我想管你借五十块钱。

en: Is it the case that you have done it?
zh: 这事儿真是你干的？

en: I think it a pity that you do not study harder.
zh: 我觉得你没更努力学习挺可惜的。

en: If you had left earlier, you would have caught the train.
zh: 你要是早点出发，就能赶上火车了。

en: What would you do if you had, say, ten thousand dollars?
zh: 假如你有，比方说，一万美金，你会干嘛？

en: I know you must be buried in your mountain of mails, but I wonder if I can hear from you regarding the mail I sent you last week?
zh: 我知道你肯定邮件多得忙不过来，但我上周发给你的那封，你有空能回一下吗？

en: Let me see the pictures you took in Paris.
zh: 给我看看你在巴黎拍的照片。

en: It is a pity that you cannot come to the party.
zh: 你不能来参加派对真可惜。

en: For all you say, I still believe in the truth of the theory.
zh: 不管你怎么说，我还是觉得那个理论是对的。

en: I can not believe you, whatever reasons you may give.
zh: 不管你找什么理由，我都不会信你的。

en: Whichever route you take, you will get there in time.
zh: 走哪条路你都能准时到。

en: I miss you so much.
zh: 我太想你了。

en: I envy you so much.
zh: 我好羡慕你啊。

en: No matter where you go, you will be welcomed.
zh: 不管你去哪儿，都会受欢迎的。

en: I see why you don't want to go there.
zh: 我明白你为什么不想去那儿了。

en: When you don't know what to do, ask the host.
zh: 你要是不知道该怎么办，就问问主人吧。

en: No matter who you are or where you are from, one thing is certain.
zh: 不管你是谁，也不管你从哪儿来，有一点是肯定的。

en: You should think of their religions.
zh: 你应该考虑一下他们的宗教信仰。

en: Did you talk for a long time?
zh: 你们聊很久了吗？

en: You are supposed to introduce yourselves in turn.
zh: 你们应该轮流做自我介绍。

en: You were in the second year of middle school last year, right?
zh: 你去年上初二，对吧？

en: You need not be afraid of making mistakes.
zh: 你不用怕犯错。

en: Did you have a good time at the party?
zh: 派对上玩得开心吗？

en: I don't mind your smoking.
zh: 我不介意你抽烟。

en: I don't agree with you smoking.
zh: 我不同意你抽烟。

en: I'm surprised to see you smoking. You didn't used to.
zh: 看到你抽烟我挺惊讶的，你以前不抽啊。

en: Do you love each other very much?
zh: 你们很爱对方吗？

en: I have spoken to you of earthy things.
zh: 我已经跟你说过一些很现实的事情了。

en: I'm afraid your request for a pay raise was turned down again.
zh: 恐怕你涨工资的要求又被拒绝了。

en: You should do all you can to help your neighbours.
zh: 你应该尽全力帮助你的邻居。

en: Without your help this plan would be impossible.
zh: 要是没有你的帮助，这个计划根本没法实现。

en: I will try to live up to your expectations.
zh: 我会努力不辜负你的期望。

en: When is your school festival?
zh: 你们学校的文化节是什么时候？

en: I'd like to join your group.
zh: 我想加入你们小组。

en: Which of you will try first?
zh: 你们谁先来试试？

en: You will save your father a lot of worry if you simply write him a letter.
zh: 你只要给你爸写封信，就能让他少操不少心。

en: You yourselves can testify to what I said.
zh: 你们自己可以为我说过的话作证。

en: I'm sorry that you should think that way.
zh: 很遗憾你会这么想。

en: I cannot abide hearing you cry so bitterly.
zh: 我真受不了听你哭得这么伤心。

en: I wasn't aware that you were so ill.
zh: 我没想到你病得这么重。

en: It is strange that you should know that.
zh: 你居然知道那件事，真奇怪。

en: I hope you'll think better of it.
zh: 我希望你能再考虑考虑，改变主意。

en: Whether you like it or not doesn't matter.
zh: 不管你喜不喜欢都无所谓。

en: The time will come when you will regret it.
zh: 总有一天你会后悔的。

en: I hope that you will like it.
zh: 希望你会喜欢。

en: There is no necessity for you to do that.
zh: 你没必要那样做。

en: It will cost you $100 to fly to the island.
zh: 飞到那个岛要花100美元。

en: I think it natural that you should take the matter into consideration.
zh: 我觉得你会考虑这件事是很自然的。

en: I think it dangerous for you to cross the river.
zh: 我觉得你过河太危险了。

en: Please tell me what you saw then.
zh: 请告诉我你当时看到了什么。

en: It is not necessary for you to quit the job.
zh: 你没必要辞掉那份工作。

en: I'll wait until you finish the work.
zh: 我会等你把工作干完。

en: How long has it been since you gave up teaching at that school?
zh: 你离开那所学校不教书多久了？

en: It is strange that you should know nothing about the matter.
zh: 你居然对这事儿一无所知，真奇怪。

en: It will make little difference whether you go there by taxi or on foot.
zh: 不管你是打车还是走路去，都差不太多。

en: The meeting will have broken up by the time you arrive there.
zh: 等你到那儿的时候，会议早就散了。

en: It's natural for you to think so.
zh: 你会这么想很正常。

en: Since you say so, I think I must believe it.
zh: 既然你都这么说了，那我觉得我只能相信了。

en: You get paid in proportion to the amount of the work you do.
zh: 你的报酬是按你的工作量来算的。

en: I will do whatever you tell me to do.
zh: 你让我干什么我就干什么。

en: When you said you'd look after Spot, you knew there'd be responsibilities.
zh: 你说要照顾斯波特的时候，就该知道这是有责任的。

en: I am glad to hear that you have got well.
zh: 听说你痊愈了，我真高兴。

en: I do hope you will come and visit us soon.
zh: 真希望你很快能来找我们玩。

en: One of the most important things you have to do right now is to carry out the plan.
zh: 你现在最重要的事之一就是执行那个计划。

en: It is necessary that you go there at once.
zh: 你得马上过去一趟。

en: If you don't go skiing, I won't, either.
zh: 如果你不去滑雪，我也不去了。

en: You just have to do as you're told.
zh: 你只要照说的做就行了。

en: Either you or Jane has to go there.
zh: 不是你去，就是简得去。

en: I am relieved that you are safe.
zh: 看到你没事我就放心了。

en: How nice to see you up and about again so soon!
zh: 真高兴看到你这么快就能下地走动了！

en: If you are not going to the concert, then neither am I.
zh: 如果你不去听音乐会，我也不去了。

en: I will help you in selecting the best from these clothes.
zh: 我帮你从这些衣服里挑件最好的。

en: I would like to see the trees from which you picked these apples.
zh: 我想去看看你摘这些苹果的那几棵树。

en: Let us know whether you can come.
zh: 能不能来跟我们打声招呼。

en: It is worth your time to read this book.
zh: 这本书值得你花点时间读读。

en: I express my cordial thanks for what you have done for this city.
zh: 衷心感谢你为这座城市所做的一切。

en: How long is it since you bought this car?
zh: 你这车买了多久了？

en: You'll be in charge of the women working in this factory.
zh: 这工厂里的女工以后由你负责。

en: You understand best how to use the machine.
zh: 这种机器怎么用，你最清楚了。

en: What miraculous sign can you show us to prove your authority to do all this?
zh: 你能显现什么神迹来证明你有权这么做？

en: We hope that you will be able to join us at this seminar.
zh: 我们希望你能来参加这次研讨会。

en: I'm sorry you're leaving us.
zh: 真舍不得你走。

en: You were fortunate to be here.
zh: 你能在这儿真是运气好。

en: I don't mind your staying here.
zh: 我不介意你待在这儿。

en: Look at this old coin you have here.
zh: 瞧瞧你手里的这枚古钱币。

en: If I had known that you were here, I would have come at once.
zh: 要是早知道你在这儿，我肯定马上就来了。

en: I wish you had come to see me yesterday.
zh: 要是你昨天能来看我就好了。

en: It was wise of you to accept his offer.
zh: 你接受了他的提议挺明智的。

en: I know you are hiding yourself behind the curtain.
zh: 我知道你就躲在窗帘后面。

en: I was disappointed when I heard that you couldn't come.
zh: 听说你来不了，我挺失望的。

en: I'd like to see you when you are free.
zh: 等你有空我想见见你。

en: What a pity it is that you can't come!
zh: 你不能来真是太可惜了！

en: It may be unwise of you to advertise your presence.
zh: 到处张扬你的行踪可能不太明智。

en: It is a pity that you can not come.
zh: 很可惜你来不了。

en: We are glad you are coming.
zh: 你能来我们很高兴。

en: I want to go wherever you're going.
zh: 不管你去哪儿我都想跟着。

en: I'll miss you very much if you go.
zh: 如果你走了，我会很想你的。

en: What a lonely world it would be with you away!
zh: 要是你不在了，这世界该有多寂寞啊！

en: I'll miss you.
zh: 我会想你的。

en: We miss you very much.
zh: 我们很想你。

en: Tell me the reason why you want to live in the countryside.
zh: 跟我说说你为什么想住乡下吧。

en: Whenever you come, you will be our guest.
zh: 不管你什么时候来，都是我们的客人。

en: You will find a hearty welcome here whenever you call.
zh: 只要你来，我们随时欢迎。

en: Let me know when you will arrive at the airport.
zh: 你到机场的时候告诉我一声。

en: May you always be happy!
zh: 祝你永远开心！

en: What you have said reminds me of a strange experience I had a few years ago.
zh: 你的话让我想起几年前我的一段奇怪经历。

en: One of the fellows you were with is a friend of mine.
zh: 跟你在一起的那伙人里，有一个是我的朋友。

en: Can you describe the situation you were in?
zh: 你能描述一下你当时的情况吗？

en: I am very happy that you have agreed to that plan.
zh: 很高兴你同意了那个计划。

en: If you insist on going alone, please do so.
zh: 如果你非要一个人去，那就去吧。

en: I will be studying when you come at seven.
zh: 你七点来的时候我应该正在学习。

en: Please bring my book up when you come.
zh: 你上来的时候顺便把我的书带上来。

en: I was expecting you at 11:00 a.m.
zh: 我本来以为你上午11点会来。

en: You came into my room.
zh: 你进我房间了。

en: Do to others as you would have them do to you.
zh: 己所不欲，勿施于人。

en: What happened to you last night?
zh: 你昨晚怎么了？

en: Did you and Joan have a blow up?
zh: 你和琼吵架了吗？

en: The announcer can talk rapidly.
zh: 那个播音员说话很快。

en: The announcer spoke English.
zh: 那个播音员说的是英语。

en: What do announcers do?
zh: 播音员是干什么的？

en: She'll be gone abroad in another six months.
zh: 再过半年她就要出国了。

en: In a few days, the baby will be able to walk.
zh: 再过几天，宝宝就会走路了。

en: Several more companies are moving to enter the lucrative pet food market of the country.
zh: 还有好几家公司正准备进入这个国家利润丰厚的宠物食品市场。

en: When will we arrive?
zh: 我们什么时候到？

en: Your plan to buy another PC is out of the question.
zh: 你想再买台电脑的事儿根本不可能。

en: We're almost there.
zh: 我们快到了。

en: We could really use another person around here.
zh: 我们这儿确实需要再来一个人帮忙。

en: I left my address book in my room.
zh: 我把通讯录落在房间里了。

en: There was a bug in my Address Book and many addresses including yours were deleted.
zh: 我的通讯录出bug了，好多联系方式都被删了，包括你的在内。

en: Adolfo likes his new school, but really remembers his friends at his old school.
zh: 阿道夫很喜欢新学校，但还是很想念老学校的朋友们。

en: Thank you for the time you spent with me during my visit to Atlanta.
zh: 谢谢你在我访问亚特兰大期间陪我。

en: Can I get a connecting flight to Atlanta?
zh: 我能在那儿转机去亚特兰大吗？

en: Do you think the Braves will take the series?
zh: 你觉得勇士队会赢得这轮系列赛吗？

en: If we can just make it through one more month, we'll be sitting pretty.
zh: 只要我们能再撑过一个月，接下来的日子就好过了。

en: I will tell you the rest tomorrow.
zh: 剩下的我明天再告诉你。

en: I'm troubled with atopic dermatitis.
zh: 我一直受特应性皮炎的困扰。

en: Time will do the rest.
zh: 剩下的交给时间吧。

en: Thank you for your advice.
zh: 谢谢你的建议。

en: Only afterward did he explain why he did it.
zh: 事后他才解释了为什么这么做。

en: Mr. Fuji died, leaving 4 children behind him.
zh: 富士先生去世了，留下了四个孩子。

en: How soon does the concert begin?
zh: 音乐会还有多久开始？

en: I'll call you later.
zh: 晚点我再打给你。

en: How much time do we have to finish this?
zh: 我们还有多少时间来完成这个？

en: I'll order that later.
zh: 那个我等下再点。

en: I'll come to your house later.
zh: 我晚点去你家。

en: Please explain it to me later.
zh: 请等会儿再跟我解释。

en: He was a kind man, as I later discovered.
zh: 后来我才发现，他其实是个心地善良的人。

en: What followed was still worse.
zh: 后面发生的事情更糟。

en: Let's check it later.
zh: 我们等会儿再查查。

en: Please call me at my hotel later.
zh: 请过会儿打到我住的酒店。

en: I'll call him back later.
zh: 我等下给他回电话。

en: Would you please come again later?
zh: 能请您过会儿再来吗？

en: I had hoped to get another 50,000 miles out of my car, but it gave up the ghost on the expressway and it would cost too much to fix it.
zh: 我本想让这车再跑五万英里，结果它在高速上彻底罢工了，修理费太贵，不值得修。

en: I have another two letters to write.
zh: 我还有两封信要写。

en: Final exams are two weeks from now.
zh: 两周后就要期末考试了。

en: I have got only a week left before school starts.
zh: 离开学只剩一周了。

en: This work will be finished in a week.
zh: 这活儿一周之内就能干完。

en: Christmas is a week away.
zh: 还有一周就是圣诞节了。

en: The new year will come in an hour.
zh: 再过一个小时就是新年了。

en: I will be free in ten minutes.
zh: 我十分钟后就有空。

en: Just stay off your feet for the next couple of weeks, and you'll be just fine.
zh: 接下来的几周你只要别乱走动，多休息，很快就会没事的。

en: I walked aimlessly about the street.
zh: 我在街上漫无目的地走着。

en: A cargo vessel, bound for Athens, sank in the Mediterranean without a trace.
zh: 一艘去雅典的货船在地中海沉了，连个影儿都没留下。

en: Please help yourself to some apple pie. I baked it for you.
zh: 别客气，尝尝苹果派吧，专门为你烤的。

en: It happened in a flash.
zh: 就在一瞬间发生的。

en: He disappeared in an instant.
zh: 他眨眼功夫就不见了。

en: Before we knew where we were, the dust storm was on us.
zh: 我们还没反应过来，沙尘暴就刮到跟前了。

en: Out of my way, boy.
zh: 闪开，小子。

en: Please go away and stop annoying me.
zh: 快走开，别在这儿烦我了。

en: Let's check that shop, too.
zh: 咱们也去那家店看看吧。

en: Oww! Oww! Oww! The bath water is too hot.
zh: 哎哟！哎哟！烫死我了！洗澡水太热了。

en: Tom may have been sick.
zh: 汤姆可能是生病了。

en: I think Mr Ashe has just got to have a cigarette.
zh: 我觉得艾什先生肯定是想抽烟了。

en: Here he is!
zh: 他在那儿呢！

en: The impudent child extended her legs across my lap.
zh: 那个没礼貌的小孩把腿直接架到我腿上了。

en: Oh, here they come!
zh: 哦，他们过来了！

en: Oh, the phone's ringing. It must be Machiko.
zh: 哎，电话响了，肯定是真知子打来的。

en: Hey Taro! It sure has been a while! How're you doing?
zh: 嘿，太郎！好久不见，最近怎么样？

en: There goes the bell.
zh: 铃响了。

en: There goes our bus.
zh: 咱们的车跑了。

en: Oh, no! I almost forgot!
zh: 坏了，我差点就忘了！

en: I'll write you as soon as I arrive there.
zh: 我一到那儿就给你写信。

en: We can see Mt. Fuji over there.
zh: 在那儿能看见富士山。

en: Please write to me when you get there.
zh: 你到了之后记得给我写信。

en: I will show you around.
zh: 我带你四处转转。

en: I found holes here and there.
zh: 我发现这儿一个洞，那儿一个洞。

en: There are clumps of daisies here and there.
zh: 这儿那儿到处都是一丛丛的雏菊。

en: There are beautiful lakes here and there.
zh: 这里到处都有漂亮的湖泊。

en: I have looked for it up and down.
zh: 我到处都找遍了。

en: The sun was shining all around.
zh: 阳光普照，到处都亮堂堂的。

en: High-rises are going up all over the place.
zh: 到处都在盖高楼。

en: When I looked about, I found a letter on the desk.
zh: 我四下看了看，发现桌上有一封信。

en: I looked around, but saw nothing.
zh: 我看了看四周，什么也没瞧见。

en: All is quiet.
zh: 四周安安静静的。

en: There came a complete silence. You could hear a pin drop.
zh: 顿时鸦雀无声，掉根针都能听得见。

en: There was complete silence. You could hear a pin drop.
zh: 全场一片死寂，安静得掉根针都能听清楚。

en: All around is silence.
zh: 周围一片死寂。

en: All was calm.
zh: 一切都很平静。

en: There is nobody about.
zh: 附近一个人都没有。

en: I saw nobody around.
zh: 我看周围一个人也没有。

en: I observed that it had already got dark.
zh: 我发现天已经黑了。

en: There were flowers all around.
zh: 到处都开满了花。

en: It is Eve that sets Adam on.
zh: 是夏娃在怂恿亚当。

en: Adam was furious with me when I broke his watch.
zh: 我弄坏了亚当的手表，他对我大发雷霆。

en: While Adam was rock-climbing, he fell and broke his leg.
zh: 亚当攀岩的时候摔了下来，把腿摔断了。

en: Mr Adams was foolish to agree to the proposal.
zh: 亚当斯先生真笨，竟然同意了那个建议。

en: I feel ill at ease with her.
zh: 跟她在一起我觉得很不自在。

en: I know him.
zh: 我认识他。

en: I don't know what to do now.
zh: 我现在不知道该怎么办才好了。

en: I will buy a watch at the store.
zh: 我要在商店里买块表。

en: So far as I know, there is no such word.
zh: 据我所知，没有这个词。

en: As if you could kill time without injuring eternity.
zh: 就像你既想打发时间，又不想损害永恒似的。

en: The girl walking over there is my daughter.
zh: 那边走着的那个女孩是我女儿。

en: See the boy and his dog that are running over there.
zh: 你看那边跑着的那个男孩和他的狗。

en: Fifteen years have passed since we went there last.
zh: 我们上次去那儿都是十五年前的事了。

en: I'm afraid that place is a little too expensive.
zh: 我怕那地方有点太贵了。

en: That's an exclusive golf club.
zh: 那是个高档的高尔夫俱乐部。

en: The dealer gave an old Nissan to me for 200,000 yen.
zh: 那个车商二十万日元就把那辆旧尼桑卖给我了。

en: That building must be on fire.
zh: 那栋楼肯定是着火了。

en: That place's food is great, and their prices are good, but the fly in the ointment is their terrible location.
zh: 那家店东西很好吃，价格也公道，美中不足的就是位置太偏了。

en: Look at those empty cans there.
zh: 你看那儿的那些空罐子。

en: Turn at that corner there.
zh: 在那个拐角那儿转弯。

en: There used to be a drugstore on that corner.
zh: 那个拐角以前有家药店。

en: To get technical information from that company, we first have to sign a non-disclosure agreement.
zh: 要想拿到那家公司的技术资料，咱们得先签个保密协议。

en: I wonder if we could have the table over there.
zh: 不知道我们能不能坐那边那个位子？

en: Look at the sports car over there.
zh: 快看那边那辆跑车。

en: It's at that counter.
zh: 就在那个柜台那儿。

en: What is the nationality of that cameraman over there?
zh: 那边那个摄影师是哪国人？

en: Please show me that one in the window over there.
zh: 麻烦给我看下橱窗里那个。

en: What's the nationality of that cameraman over there?
zh: 那边那个摄影师是哪国人？

en: Who is the woman standing there?
zh: 在那儿站着的那个女的是谁？

en: Look at the tall pretty girl standing there.
zh: 你看在那儿站着的那个又高又漂亮的女孩。

en: The fellow standing over there is my friend.
zh: 那边站着的那个小伙子是我朋友。

en: Do you know the name of the boy standing over there?
zh: 你知道那边站着的那个男孩叫什么吗？

en: The man who is standing there is my father.
zh: 在那儿站着的那个人是我爸。

en: The man standing over there is Mr Smith.
zh: 那边站着的那个男人是史密斯先生。

en: The man standing over there is the owner of the store.
zh: 那边站着的那个男人是这家店的老板。

en: The boy standing over there is my son.
zh: 那边站着的那个男孩是我儿子。

en: We can see his house over there.
zh: 往那边看就能看到他家。

en: It is illegal to park a car there.
zh: 那儿不能停车，是违法的。

en: Can you see the big white building over there?
zh: 你看见那边那栋白色的大楼了吗？

en: You will see a red house over there.
zh: 你往那边看，能看到一个红房子。

en: Just step right over there.
zh: 往那边走几步就行。

en: We see a sleeping car there.
zh: 我们在那儿看到了一辆卧铺车。

en: The man sitting over there is a famous singer.
zh: 那边坐着的那个男人是个出名的歌手。

en: You see a tall building over there.
zh: 你能看见那边有一栋高楼。

en: It is rumoured there are treasures hidden there.
zh: 听说那儿藏着宝贝。

en: That boy over there will be Tom's brother.
zh: 那边那个男孩应该是汤姆的兄弟。

en: Just look at that female over there.
zh: 你看那边那个女的。

en: The boy over there is bowing to you.
zh: 那边那个男孩在向你鞠躬呢。

en: It's easy to see the fireworks from over there.
zh: 从那边看烟花特别清楚。

en: You can ask the child who's playing over there.
zh: 你可以问问在那边玩的那个小孩。

en: The students studying over there are my friends.
zh: 在那边学习的那些学生是我朋友。

en: Let's rent a bike there.
zh: 咱们在那儿租辆自行车吧。

en: What is going on there now?
zh: 那儿现在出什么事了？

en: Look at her putting on airs over there.
zh: 你看她在那儿摆谱呢。

en: The girl singing over there is my sister.
zh: 那边唱歌的那个女孩是我姐。

en: What were you doing down there?
zh: 你刚才在下面干嘛呢？

en: They sell many types of food and grocery products.
zh: 他们卖各种各样的食物和杂货。

en: You can't buy it anywhere but there.
zh: 除了那儿，别的地方都买不到。

en: That is the office where he works.
zh: 那就是他工作的办公室。

en: A form appeared from over there.
zh: 那边出现了一个身影。

en: That's the house where Tom was born.
zh: 那就是汤姆出生的那间房子。

en: When we rush to complete our work, we make needless errors.
zh: 赶工的时候容易出些没必要的错。

en: The ASEAN nations have come a long way.
zh: 东盟这些国家发展得挺不错了。

en: If it should rain tomorrow, I won't play golf.
zh: 明天万一下雨的话，我就不打高尔夫了。

en: I have to buy one tomorrow.
zh: 我明天得去买一个。

en: I wonder if it will be fine tomorrow.
zh: 也不知道明天天气好不好。

en: I will go to the sea if it is fine tomorrow.
zh: 明天要是天儿好，我就去海边。

en: Please remind me to write a letter tomorrow.
zh: 明天记得提醒我写封信。

en: I'll call on you at your office tomorrow.
zh: 我明天去你办公室找你。

en: In case it rains tomorrow, we should make another arrangement.
zh: 要是明天下雨，咱还得换个计划。

en: If it rains tomorrow, I will stay at home.
zh: 明天要是下雨我就待在家里。

en: I am going to do it first thing tomorrow.
zh: 明天一早我就去办这事。

en: Take two aspirin tablets.
zh: 吃两片阿司匹林吧。

en: Could you send up some aspirin?
zh: 能帮我送点阿司匹林上来吗？

en: Aspirin has no effect on the blood pressure.
zh: 阿司匹林对血压没什么影响。

en: What does aspirin consist of?
zh: 阿司匹林里头都有啥成分？

en: I am allergic to aspirin, penicillin, and sulfa drugs.
zh: 我对阿司匹林、青霉素还有磺胺类药过敏。

en: I have to take an examination in history tomorrow.
zh: 我明天得考历史。

en: I hope it'll be fine tomorrow.
zh: 希望明天是个好天气。

en: It will be fine tomorrow.
zh: 明天天气会挺好的。

en: Tomorrow never comes.
zh: 明天永远等不到。

en: Let's leave tomorrow morning.
zh: 咱明天早上走吧。

en: By tomorrow morning all the world will have been covered with snow.
zh: 到明天早上，到处都会白茫茫的一片。

en: I'll do that first thing in the morning.
zh: 我明儿一早就去办。

en: What will you be doing at this time tomorrow?
zh: 明天这个时候你在干嘛呢？

en: It will have been raining for a week by tomorrow.
zh: 到明天这雨就下了一整周了。

en: I am to call on Mr Smith tomorrow.
zh: 我明天要去拜访史密斯先生。

en: I will speak to you tomorrow.
zh: 我明天再跟你说。

en: I'll get in touch with you by phone tomorrow.
zh: 我明天电话联系你。

en: I'll call for you at 8 tomorrow morning.
zh: 我明天早上八点来接你。

en: I hope the weather will clear up tomorrow.
zh: 希望明天天能放晴。

en: I have to give a testimony in the courtroom tomorrow.
zh: 我明天得出庭作证。

en: There is no telling what will happen tomorrow.
zh: 谁也说不准明天会发生什么。

en: I will stay home tomorrow.
zh: 我明天在家待着。

en: I'll be free all day tomorrow.
zh: 我明天整天都有空。

en: Tomorrow is my birthday.
zh: 明天我过生日。

en: My guess is that it will be fine tomorrow.
zh: 我估摸着明天是个好天。

en: What's the forecast for tomorrow?
zh: 明天天气预报怎么说？

en: Do not oversleep tomorrow morning.
zh: 明天早上可别睡过头了。

en: May I be excused from tomorrow's class?
zh: 明天的课我能请个假吗？

en: The assistant took the money.
zh: 助手把钱拿走了。

en: The assistant kept $2.
zh: 助手自己留了两块钱。

en: After the assistant returned $1 to each one, each man had actually paid only $9.
zh: 助手给每个人退了一块钱后，其实大伙儿每人只出了九块。

en: The hydrangea blooms in June.
zh: 绣球花六月份开。

en: The seal kept its balance well on the large ball.
zh: 海豹在大球上平衡找得挺稳的。

en: The imports from Asian countries have expanded recently.
zh: 最近亚洲国家的进口量增加了不少。

en: Asia is roughly four times the size of Europe.
zh: 亚洲面积差不多是欧洲的四倍。

en: Asia is much larger than Australia.
zh: 亚洲可比澳大利亚大多了。

en: I am interested in Asian history.
zh: 我对亚洲历史挺感兴趣的。

en: People of Asia must work together.
zh: 亚洲各国人民得齐心协力才行。

en: Asian religions inspire him to create splendid sculptures.
zh: 亚洲宗教给了他灵感，让他创作出精美的雕塑。

en: Many peoples live in Asia.
zh: 亚洲生活着许多民族。

en: There are many people in Asia.
zh: 亚洲人很多。

en: Students from Asia studying abroad speak English too, just as Japanese students do.
zh: 亚洲留学生也说英语，就像日本学生一样。

en: The seals surface more frequently then, so a bear's chance of catching one at a breathing hole is greater after nightfall.
zh: 那时候海豹浮出水面的次数更频繁，所以天黑后，熊在呼吸孔抓到海豹的机会更大。

en: Being active at night may relate to the behavior of seals, which feed at night on various fish that come up closer to the surface.
zh: 它们在夜间活动可能跟海豹的行为有关，海豹晚上会捕食那些游到水面附近的各种鱼类。

en: Come the day after tomorrow.
zh: 后天过来。

en: I will have him come here the day after tomorrow.
zh: 我会让他后天过来。

en: The applicant will be coming to see you the day after tomorrow.
zh: 申请人后天会来见你。

en: If it rains the day after tomorrow, I will stay at home.
zh: 如果后天下雨，我就待在家里。

en: The day after tomorrow is Tom's birthday.
zh: 后天是汤姆的生日。

en: Do you have time the day after tomorrow?
zh: 你后天有空吗？

en: The bearded god had promised to return someday in the same way he had left.
zh: 那个满脸胡子的神曾许诺，总有一天他会以离开时的方式回来。

en: The beard does not make the philosopher.
zh: 留胡子的不一定就是哲学家。

en: His beard made him look older by ten years.
zh: 他的胡子让他看起来老了十岁。

en: Only in theory, the project is possible.
zh: 这个项目只在理论上可行。

en: The punch on the jaw brought me to my knees.
zh: 下巴挨的那一拳打得我跪在了地上。

en: He persisted in his opinion.
zh: 他坚持自己的意见。

en: Don't do wicked things.
zh: 别做坏事。

en: He was an American, as I knew from his accent.
zh: 听口音我就知道他是美国人。

en: I'm always bored with films that have little action.
zh: 我总觉得没什么动作戏的电影很无聊。

en: I can tell by his accent that he is German.
zh: 我能从口音听出来他是德国人。

en: I'm speechless.
zh: 我无语了。

en: Achilles was an ancient Greek hero.
zh: 阿喀琉斯是古希腊英雄。

en: To my dismay, he was caught cheating in the examination.
zh: 让我感到沮丧的是，他考试作弊被抓住了。

en: You may as well give up.
zh: 你还是放弃吧。

en: Don't give up. Stick with the job.
zh: 别放弃，坚持做下去。

en: If you keep trying, you will make progress.
zh: 只要你继续努力，就会进步的。

en: Akira is using that same dictionary that his father used as a student.
zh: 阿亮正在用他爸爸当学生时用的那本词典。

en: Akira went out for a few minutes.
zh: 阿亮出去了几分钟。

en: Akira can play tennis well.
zh: 阿亮网球打得很好。

en: Akira is a good tennis player.
zh: 阿亮是个很棒的网球选手。

en: Akira is good at playing tennis.
zh: 阿亮很擅长打网球。

en: Akira will stay in New York while his money lasts.
zh: 只要钱还没花完，阿亮就会一直留在纽约。

en: What does Akina have on?
zh: 明菜穿的是什么？

en: Do you mind if I turn off the light?
zh: 你介意我关灯吗？

en: As a light goes out, so a man dies.
zh: 人死如灯灭。

en: Frankly, I don't like him.
zh: 老实说，我不喜欢他。

en: Would you please refrain from smoking when babies are here?
zh: 这里有宝宝，能不能请你不要抽烟？

en: If there is already an account, there is a system by which you are able to send and receive email.
zh: 如果已经有账号了，就可以通过那个系统来收发邮件。

en: Tyger, Tyger, burning bright.
zh: 老虎，老虎，火一样辉煌。

en: I dared to support his opinion.
zh: 我斗胆支持了他的看法。

en: You need not take the trouble to go.
zh: 你没必要费心跑这一趟。

en: At the risk of sticking my neck out, I think that if we do that, we're making a big, big mistake.
zh: 冒着当出头鸟的风险，我觉得如果我们那样做，就犯了大错。

en: You don't have to cancel your vacation.
zh: 你不用取消假期。

en: Dare you ask me another question?
zh: 你还敢再问我一个问题吗？

en: I will not presume to give an opinion.
zh: 我不敢冒然发表意见。

en: I make a special point of avoiding that shop.
zh: 我特意避开那家店。

en: Before Einstein, scientists used to think that space had no end.
zh: 在爱因斯坦之前，科学家们一直认为空间是无边无际的。

en: I love the outdoors, but I hate bugs.
zh: 我喜欢户外，但我讨厌虫子。

en: Einstein was a mathematical genius.
zh: 爱因斯坦是个数学天才。

en: Einstein was far in advance of his time.
zh: 爱因斯坦的思想远超他那个时代。

en: Einstein loved playing the violin.
zh: 爱因斯坦很喜欢拉小提琴。

en: Einstein's theories contributed greatly to modern science.
zh: 爱因斯坦的理论对现代科学贡献巨大。

en: Einstein's theory of relativity is Greek to me.
zh: 爱因斯坦的相对论对我来说简直是天书。

en: Such scientists as Einstein are rare.
zh: 像爱因斯坦这样的科学家很少见。

en: Theoretical physics was child's play to Einstein, but he couldn't figure out his income tax.
zh: 理论物理对爱因斯坦来说易如反掌，但他却搞不懂自己的个人所得税。

en: We associate Einstein with the theory of relativity.
zh: 一提到爱因斯坦，我们就会想到相对论。

en: We associate the name of Einstein with the theory of relativity.
zh: 爱因斯坦这个名字总是和相对论联系在一起。

en: Einstein has been dead for nearly forty years.
zh: 爱因斯坦已经去世快四十年了。

en: I'm hopeless at ironing so I buy permanent press clothes.
zh: 我实在不会熨衣服，所以我都买免熨烫的。

en: I burned my hand with an iron.
zh: 我被熨斗烫到手了。

en: The Irishman replies.
zh: 那个爱尔兰人回答道。

en: Ireland is famous for lace.
zh: 爱尔兰以蕾丝闻名。

en: Ireland and England are separated by the sea.
zh: 爱尔兰和英格兰隔海相望。

en: Iris, what do you usually eat for breakfast?
zh: 艾丽丝，你早餐平时都吃什么？

en: Irene Pepperberg holds a round tray in front of a parrot she has named Alex.
zh: 艾琳·佩珀伯格在一只她起名为亚历克斯的鹦鹉面前举着一个圆托盘。

en: We should put out a call for bids.
zh: 我们应该进行公开招标。

en: I'm afraid the line is busy.
zh: 抱歉，电话占线。

en: I'm sorry, my father is out.
zh: 不好意思，我父亲出去了。

en: I'm sorry my father is out.
zh: 抱歉，我爸爸不在家。

en: I'm afraid we don't have any left.
zh: 恐怕我们已经没有剩的了。

en: To my great disappointment, she didn't come.
zh: 让我感到很失望的是，她没来。

en: Unfortunately he refused to come.
zh: 很遗憾，他拒绝过来。

en: Unfortunately, the store was closed.
zh: 不凑巧，商店关门了。

en: Unfortunately I hit the morning rush hour.
zh: 真倒霉，我正好赶上了早高峰。

en: As it happened, my grandmother was not at home.
zh: 碰巧我奶奶不在家。

en: Unfortunately, there was no one around.
zh: 很不巧，当时周围一个人都没有。

en: Unfortunately I was not in time for his speech.
zh: 很遗憾，我没赶上他的演讲。

en: As it happens, I have left the camera at home.
zh: 碰巧我把相机忘在家里了。

en: Unfortunately I have no money with me.
zh: 真不巧，我身上没带钱。

en: I don't happen to have your application on hand at the moment.
zh: 我手头现在正好没有你的申请书。

en: As it happened, my grandmother was not at home that day.
zh: 也是不凑巧，那天我奶奶正好不在家。

en: Unfortunately, it rained yesterday.
zh: 很不巧，昨天下了雨。

en: As it happens, I have no money with me now.
zh: 刚好我这会儿身上没带钱。

en: Unfortunately, it rained.
zh: 很遗憾，下雨了。

en: I picked a most unfortunate time to visit him.
zh: 我去拜访他的时间选得太不凑巧了。

en: Sorry, but he is out now.
zh: 抱歉，他现在出去了。

en: I'm sorry, today is fully booked.
zh: 实在抱歉，今天已经预订满了。

en: I'm sorry, but I can't accept your invitation. I have other plans on that day.
zh: 很抱歉，我没法接受你的邀请，那天我有别的安排。

en: Unfortunately, I missed seeing the movie.
zh: 真遗憾，我没看成那部电影。

en: I'm afraid I can't accept your invitation.
zh: 恐怕我没法接受你的邀请。

en: I regret to say that the product you have asked for is currently out of stock.
zh: 很抱歉，您要的那款产品目前缺货。

en: As it happens, she is absent.
zh: 碰巧她不在。

en: As it happened, I left my homework at home.
zh: 也是不凑巧，我把作业忘家里了。

en: I'm sorry, your line is busy.
zh: 不好意思，你拨打的电话占线。

en: At the pop star's concert the fans were swarming around the foot of the stage.
zh: 在流行歌星的演唱会上，粉丝们都簇拥在舞台边。

en: Accepting the other's norms is submitting to the other's power.
zh: 接受别人的规范就是向别人的权力低头。

en: Ai and Mariko are close friends. They go everywhere together.
zh: 小爱和真理子是好朋友，她们总是形影不离。

en: There is no shortage of ideas.
zh: 点子多得是。

en: He shot at me.
zh: 他朝我开了枪。

en: I wouldn't push him too far. You don't know what he might do. I'd say you can't be too careful. They say even a doomed mouse will bite a cat if he has no choice.
zh: 我觉得你最好别把他逼得太急，你根本不知道他能干出什么来。我觉得再怎么小心都不为过。俗话说兔子急了还咬人呢。

en: He's a different person when he's drunk, so I don't like to drink with him.
zh: 他喝多了就跟变了个人似的，所以我不太喜欢跟他喝酒。

en: He shall die.
zh: 他死定了。

en: I will give him trouble.
zh: 我会给他找点麻烦的。

en: He gives me chills.
zh: 他让我感到毛骨悚然。

en: They passed out.
zh: 他们晕过去了。

en: The sight of him is hateful to me.
zh: 我一看见他就心烦。

en: What fools they are!
zh: 他们可真笨啊！

en: I don't think they've fully adapted to the working world yet. They still seem like students.
zh: 我觉得他们还没完全适应职场，看着还跟学生似的。

en: They are out of hand.
zh: 他们已经失控了。

en: He's not a very meticulous guy.
zh: 他这人不太心细。

en: I'll take my revenge on him at all costs tomorrow.
zh: 明天我无论如何也要找他报仇。

en: Bastard hung up on me.
zh: 那个混蛋居然挂我电话。

en: He's likely to be late so you'd better tell him again that the meeting time is seven to make double sure.
zh: 他很有可能会迟到，所以你最好再跟他确认一遍是七点集合，保险一点。

en: He is a wolf in sheep's clothing.
zh: 他就是个披着羊皮的狼。

en: She got tired of his waffling and dumped him.
zh: 她受不了他那副优柔寡断的样子，就把他给甩了。

en: He is really a perfect idiot.
zh: 他真是个十足的笨蛋。

en: He is a daredevil.
zh: 他是个不要命的家伙。

en: He's got money to burn.
zh: 他钱多得没处花。

en: He is too dumb to fear danger.
zh: 他傻到不知道什么叫危险。

en: He is no better than a thief.
zh: 他跟小偷没什么两样。

en: He is a shame of the town.
zh: 他是全镇的耻辱。

en: That fellow is a thorough fool.
zh: 那家伙是个彻头彻尾的傻瓜。

en: Oh, he eats like a bird.
zh: 喔，他吃饭跟猫舔似的，胃口特别小。

en: That fellow can't tell right from wrong.
zh: 那家伙是非不分。

en: He was the cock of the walk.
zh: 他以前在那儿可是称王称霸的。

en: He is a formidable opponent.
zh: 他是个很难对付的对手。

en: He is a spoiled child.
zh: 他是个被惯坏的孩子。

en: Watch out for him. That guy can really hold a grudge.
zh: 小心点他，那家伙报复心特别强。

en: He is so heartless.
zh: 他这人太狠心了。

en: He is a poet or something.
zh: 他是个诗人什么的。

en: They say fine words are no virtue if they're insincere and that's him in a nutshell. He's all talk but doesn't mean a word of it.
zh: 俗话说巧言令色，指的就是他。他光会耍嘴皮子，没一句真心话。

en: He has a sharp tongue.
zh: 他说话挺刻薄的。

en: He has a smooth tongue.
zh: 他嘴特别甜。

en: Don't tell him. He's got a loose tongue.
zh: 别告诉他，他嘴上没个把门的。

en: He is nasty.
zh: 他这人挺阴险的。

en: He is a tough customer.
zh: 他是个难缠的主。

en: He has more lives than a cat.
zh: 他命大得很，跟猫一样。

en: All those tricks he's got up his sleeve make him a formidable client.
zh: 他满脑子都是歪主意，是个很难搞的客户。

en: He is a self-willed fellow.
zh: 他是个特别固执的人。

en: He has an evil countenance.
zh: 他长得一脸凶相。

en: He should have worked harder.
zh: 他本该更努力点的。

en: He is a hard boiled egg.
zh: 他是个铁石心肠的人。

en: What an oddball he is!
zh: 他真是个怪人！

en: He is busy loafing on the job.
zh: 他正忙着摸鱼呢。

en: He is no ordinary man.
zh: 他可不是个一般人。

en: He is very mercenary.
zh: 他这人见钱眼开。

en: That fellow is a cool hand.
zh: 那家伙是个老江湖，特别沉得住气。

en: That man is notorious as a gambler.
zh: 那家伙是个出了名的赌鬼。

en: He is the dumbest kid in the class.
zh: 他是班里最笨的孩子。

en: He's a car nut. Ask him anything.
zh: 他是个车迷，你有什么尽管问他。

en: That guy is always asking his parents for money.
zh: 那家伙老是跟他爸妈伸手要钱。

en: He is complaining about something or other all the time.
zh: 他整天都在那儿没完没了地抱怨。

en: Who the devil was that?
zh: 刚才那到底是谁啊？

en: He's a big show-off when girls are around.
zh: 只要有女生在，他就特别爱显摆。

en: That guy really burns me up.
zh: 那家伙真让我火大。

en: He is a good joker.
zh: 他挺幽默的。

en: Finally, he lost his temper.
zh: 他最后终于发火了。

en: He's a goner.
zh: 他这下彻底完蛋了。

en: I find just the memory of his overly polite patronizing manner really offensive.
zh: 一想到他那副假客气又瞧不起人的样子我就觉得恶心。

en: His talk bores me to death.
zh: 他说的话真是无聊透顶。

en: I gave him a stern talking to.
zh: 我狠狠地说了他一顿。

en: His little sister is very cute, isn't she?
zh: 他妹妹挺可爱的，不是吗？

en: It constantly appalls me how stupid he can be.
zh: 他能笨到这种地步，真是让我没法理解。

en: I'll put his courage to the test.
zh: 我要试一试他的胆量。

en: He is a jack-of-all-trades.
zh: 他是个万金油，什么活儿都会一点。

en: I have to cover his loss.
zh: 我得替他承担损失。

en: I'll kill him.
zh: 我要弄死他。

en: I don't like his smart way of talking.
zh: 我不喜欢他那种自以为是的说话口气。

en: I have had quite enough of his jokes.
zh: 我真是受够了他的那些笑话了。

en: I don't live in his pocket.
zh: 我又不是非得围着他转。

en: You don't have to listen to what he says.
zh: 你不用听他的。

en: Don't take any notice of what he says.
zh: 别理他说了什么。

en: Nobody likes him, because he is always blowing his own horn.
zh: 没人喜欢他，因为他总爱自吹自擂。

en: I'll bewitch him into a frog!
zh: 我要把他变成一只青蛙！

en: You can trust him with any job.
zh: 任何活儿交给他你都尽管放心。

en: He made up a pretext for a fight with me.
zh: 他找了个借口跟我吵了一架。

en: I was deceived by him.
zh: 我被他给骗了。

en: I'm up to here with him!
zh: 我真是受够他了！

en: I can't abide that fellow.
zh: 我实在受不了那家伙。

en: I don't know what to do with that guy. No matter how mad I get at him he just takes it in stride and pays no attention.
zh: 我真拿那家伙没办法，不管我多生气，他都跟没事人一样，根本不理我。

en: Anyone who criticizes him is asking for trouble.
zh: 谁要是批评他，那就是自找麻烦。

en: I absolutely will not speak to that fellow again!
zh: 我以后绝对不会再跟那家伙说一句话了！

en: I've done with him for the future.
zh: 以后我跟他算是彻底没关系了。

en: I don't get along with that guy.
zh: 我跟那家伙合不来。

en: I wonder where he is hiding.
zh: 我倒想知道他到底躲到哪儿去了。

en: He's always talking like a big shot, but it won't be long before all his faults are exposed.
zh: 他总是摆出一副大人物的架势，不过要不了多久他那些毛病就都得露馅。

en: He lives a freewheeling life. I think he ought to settle down a little.
zh: 他的生活太随心所欲了，我觉得他该稳重一点了。

en: He called me a stupid boy.
zh: 他骂我是个笨小子。

en: You're crazy if you think he's on the up-and-up. The only reason you can say that is because you don't know what he's doing behind the scenes.
zh: 你要是觉得他为人正派，那你就是疯了。你这么说只是因为不知道他在背后干的那些勾当。

en: He looks suspicious.
zh: 他看起来鬼鬼祟祟的。

en: He stole my purse from me.
zh: 他偷了我的钱包。

en: I don't care what they say.
zh: 不管他们说什么，我都不在乎。

en: He hurled defiance at me.
zh: 他公然向我叫板。

en: The idea that he is going to make a speech is laughable.
zh: 让他去演讲简直就是个笑话。

en: He buggered it up.
zh: 他把这事儿给搞砸了。

en: It must have been something really big for him to strike a triumphant pose like that.
zh: 他能摆出那种得意的样子，肯定是有什么了不得的大事。

en: That man is a wet blanket.
zh: 那家伙真是个扫兴的人。

en: He is buttering up to his boss.
zh: 他在拍老板的马屁。

en: Ouch! My foot!
zh: 哎哟！我的脚！

en: Iceland used to belong to Denmark.
zh: 冰岛以前属于丹麦。

en: Ice hockey is an exciting sport.
zh: 冰球是一项让人兴奋的运动。

en: The ice cream vendor is waiting on customers at his outdoor stand.
zh: 卖冰淇淋的正在他的室外摊位那儿招待客人。

en: Give me three ice creams, please.
zh: 请给我三个冰淇淋。

en: Two ice creams, please.
zh: 请给我两个冰淇淋。

en: Ike doesn't seem to be up to the mark today.
zh: 艾克今天状态好像不太行。

en: It is still as cold as ever.
zh: 还是像以前一样冷。

en: No wonder he failed the exam, after wasting so much time like that.
zh: 他浪费了这么多时间，难怪考试没及格。

en: Ah, you're leaving tomorrow!
zh: 啊，你明天就要走了啊！

en: Look! There's a plane taking off.
zh: 快看！有架飞机起飞了。

en: Ah, me!
zh: 唉，我真命苦！

en: Now I remember.
zh: 我想起来了。

en: How awful!
zh: 真糟糕！

en: Whatever I say, he has a comeback ready. You can't get a word in edgewise.
zh: 不管我说什么他都有话回，我根本插不上嘴。

en: How glad I am!
zh: 我太高兴了！

en: Well, here we are at last.
zh: 好了，终于到了。

en: Wow, we're finally in Paris. Where should we visit first?
zh: 哇，终于到巴黎了。咱们先去哪儿转转？

en: Armstrong was the first man to reach the moon.
zh: 阿姆斯特朗是第一个登上月球的人。

en: Ah, I've failed again!
zh: 唉，我又失败了！

en: Oh, I do wish I could go to France.
zh: 噢，我真想去法国啊。

en: Arnold teaches us to see the object as it really is.
zh: 阿诺德教我们要客观地看待事物。

en: Arnold is concerned with cases of dual personality.
zh: 阿诺德很关注双重人格的案例。

en: Arnie, can you hold on until help comes?
zh: 阿尼，你能坚持到救援赶来吗？

en: I love art and quiet evenings at home.
zh: 我喜欢艺术，也喜欢晚上在家安安静静地待着。

en: Oh yeah, that's right. I was supposed to meet some friends in Shibuya at eight.
zh: 哦对，我想起来了，我本该在八点去涩谷见几个朋友。

en: Oh, yes, I remember.
zh: 哦，是的，我想起来了。

en: Archie made a move on her.
zh: 阿奇对她采取行动了。

en: Oh? I want to see him, too.
zh: 噢？我也想见见他。

en: A beautiful object like that never loses its value.
zh: 那种漂亮的东西永远不会贬值。

en: Am I hungry!
zh: 我可真饿啊！

en: If he goes on like that, he will never amount to much.
zh: 要是他再这么下去，以后肯定没什么出息。

en: It would be better for you to stay away from such a man.
zh: 你最好还是离那种人远点儿。

en: Break off with such a man as that.
zh: 跟那种人断绝来往吧。

en: I felt utterly out of place among those sophisticated people.
zh: 在那些老练的人中间，我觉得自己格格不入。

en: A politician like that gets my goat.
zh: 那种政客最让我火大了。

en: A man like that gets on my nerves.
zh: 那种人真让我心烦。

en: These bus ladies seem to like to do so.
zh: 这些公交车上的大妈好像就喜欢这么做。

en: That kind of behaviour affects your honour.
zh: 那种行为会影响你的名誉。

en: Sofas like that don't come cheap.
zh: 那种沙发可不便宜。

en: Don't do anything like that again.
zh: 别再做那种事了。

en: Oh man! I was sure this was going to work out.
zh: 天哪！我本以为这事儿肯定能成。

en: Oh, the toast is burned black.
zh: 哎呀，吐司烤焦了。

en: The long rain makes me sick.
zh: 这连绵不断的雨真让人心烦。

en: Oh, the train is being delayed.
zh: 噢，火车晚点了。

en: Yes. She used to be a very shy girl.
zh: 是的，她以前是个很害羞的女孩。

en: Oh, have you?
zh: 哦，是吗？

en: Yeah, I've always thought it's as plain as the nose on your face.
zh: 没错，我一直觉得这明摆着嘛。

en: How I wish I could go, too!
zh: 我多想也能去啊！

en: Oh, what a scare!
zh: 哎哟，吓死我了！
